title: COCONUT-LIME CHICKEN CURRY SOUP RECIPE
directions: Place the first nine ingredients in a 4- or 5-qt. slow cooker; stir in chicken. Cook, covered, on low 4-5 hours or until chicken is tender.
Skim fat; stir in cooked rice. Cook, covered, on low 15-30 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle servings with cilantro. Yield: 8 servings (2-1/2 quarts).
ingredients: 2 cans (13.66 ounces each) light coconut milk
2 cans (4 ounces each) chopped green chilies
2 pounds boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
